channel.title: CHFI on Chris Clarkson
channel.description: Recent content in CHFI on Chris Clarkson

item.title: CHFI - Certified Hacking Forensics Investigator
item.description: A very insightful course into art of computer forensics and the techniques that are used to catch hackers. Very interesting to take the knowledge gained here and work out ways to evade them, excellent course to take that stage further and develop the adversarial mindset.
